page.title: 08Religion
page.content: In our area there are numerous chapels,one catholic church and two Church in Wales (Church of England Churches).The catholic church is easily the best supported.The non-conformist churches,all built in late ninetenth or early twentieth century,all have dwindling congregations as have the two churches due to religious apathy,especially by the younger generation and possibly because there are too many of them in a small area. All schools in the area have a daily non-denominational service.There is also compulsory religious education in every school.
